infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: MeetBridge needs your location to show you nearby matches and update your profile location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: MeetBridge needs your location in the background to keep your profile location up-to-date and show you the best matches.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow MeetBridge to use your location to show nearby matches and keep your profile updated.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow MeetBridge to use your location in the background to keep your profile location up-to-date.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow MeetBridge to use your location to show nearby matches.
